law.catch_line: The Board shall investigate each claim filed under § 10-305 of this subtitle....

section.section: The Board shall investigate each claim filed under § 10-305 of this subtitle.

After its investigation, the Board shall:
approve the claim;
approve the claim subject to conditions and limitations; or
disapprove the claim.

text.section: The Board shall append to the original papers representing the claim a concise written statement of the facts developed in the proceedings on which its approval, conditional or limited approval, or disapproval is based.

section.section: The Board shall file the original papers representing the claim and all appended documents in the office of the Secretary.

The Board shall send a copy of the original papers representing the claim and all appended documents to:
the Comptroller; and
the Secretary of Budget and Management.
The Comptroller and the Secretary of Budget and Management shall keep a record of the documents sent by the Secretary under item (i) of this paragraph.
The original papers representing the claim and all appended documents constitute a permanent claims record.
